column1: |title=Lórien & The Halls of the Elven Smiths
'''''Lórien and the Halls of the Elven Smiths''''' is a module (in the ''Campaign''-series) for ''[[Middle-earth Role Playing]]''

column2: [[Mithril Miniatures]] released a set of metal miniatures (M205 - M214 ''Lórien Elves'').

column1: The reasons why one Elven kingdom survived to see the dawn of the Fourth Age and why one fell to the Dark Lord over four thousand years earlier are myriad... All the while Lórien
column2: though nearer to the Black Land
column4: its mistress too strong to be overcome by the devices of the wraith-prince in Dol Guldur
column5: and too clever to become a target for the Dark Lord himself.

column1: *8 FULL COLOR PAGES: Campaign across the perilous Misty Mountains on 4 Regional Maps or delve into intrigue in 3 great cities.

column4: and of course the Halls of the Jewel Smiths
column5: each an ideal adventure site laden with traps and treasure.

column1: *ELVEN HISTORY AND BACKGROUND: Learn about the lore and nature of Elves
column2: with the extensive material on the noble Noldor

column1: *THE THREE RINGS OF POWER: Read about three of Middle-earth's greatest magic items
column2: the story of the making of the Rings
column3: and a complete description of NENYA
